description: A case's holding or reasoning is expressly disapproved by a later case (stronger than questioned, weaker than overruled)

disapproval_type.description: Type: complete, partial, obiter_dicta, reasoning, holding

disapproval_reason.description: Explicit reason for disapproval stated by the court

disapproved_aspect.description: What was disapproved: holding, reasoning, interpretation, principle

scope.description: Scope of disapproval: narrow, moderate, broad

binding_effect.description: Whether disapproval has binding effect: binding, persuasive, none

citation_quote.description: Direct quote from judgment expressing disapproval

continuing_validity.description: Extent to which disapproved case retains validity

indexes: CREATE INDEX disapproved_type IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:DISAPPROVED]-() ON (r.disapproval_type)
CREATE INDEX disapproved_binding IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:DISAPPROVED]-() ON (r.binding_effect)
CREATE INDEX disapproved_aspect IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:DISAPPROVED]-() ON (r.disapproved_aspect)
usage_examples:
// Find cases with binding disapprovals
MATCH (c:Case)<-[d:DISAPPROVED]-(:Case)
WHERE d.binding_effect = 'binding'
RETURN c.citation, COUNT(*) AS disapproval_count
ORDER BY disapproval_count DESC
LIMIT 10
